entry.title: Dynarex DynaGo Quad Rollator
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynarex Corporation
Type: Rollator
Price: 72.95 - 79.99 (2 variants)

Dynarex DynaGo Quad Rollators provide added support and mobility along with maximum user comfort. The Rollator Walker functions excellently on uneven surfaces. Dynarex Rollators are equipped with height adjustable handles, deluxe loop locks, and non-marking wheels. A basket is included for storage. The DynaGo Quad Rollator is available with 6" or 7.5" wheels.

  •  300 lbs Weight Capacity
  • Designed for user comfort
  • Functions excellently on uneven surfaces
  • Adjustable handle height
  • Deluxe loop locks
  • Non-marking wheels
  • Basket included
  • Available with 6" or 7.5" wheels

entry.title: DynaGo Zoom - Aluminum Rollator with 3" Wheels, Red, 1pc/cs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynarex Corporation
Type: Rollator
Price: 85.99

The DynaGo Zoom Rollator is ideal for movement through narrow spaces, with a focus on style and affordability. The rollator easily folds and remains folded in a standard position for simple transportation and storage. Equipped with loop lock hand brakes for safety and ergonomic, height adjustable handles, as well as a deep storage pouch.

The Dynarex DynaGo Zoom Rollator is constructed with sturdy aluminum frame, and 7.5-inch non-marking wheels, it offers maneuverability and stability, while remaining lightweight. The rollator features removable, deep storage pouch with ample storage space and providing easy access to valuable and personal belongings. 

  • Lightweight Aluminum frame equipped with deluxe loop locks with a permanent reverse braking system.
  • 7.5-inch non-marking wheels.
  • Convenient, removable, storage pouch keeping personal items secure and out of sight.
  • Height adjustable ergonomic handles.
  • Folds flat with storage pouch attached, making it easy for transportation and storage
    .

entry.title: Lumex® Easy Lift Patient Lifting System: 400 lb weight capacity
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lumex
Type: Patient Lifting System
Price: 1540.00

Features heavy-gauge steel construction wit ha white powder-coated finish. The 6-point spreader bar with 360° rotation used Lumex 6-point, 4-point, or 2-point slings. The unique, ergonomic foot pedal leg opening and large, easy-to-grip handles facilitate maneuvering. Convenient features include an ergonomic hand pendant with pendant hook and a warning beep for low battery charge and weight capacity levels. The lower base height maximizes stability and fits under most beds, and the rubber base coating protects furniture and walls. The 24VDC motor provides quiet, smooth operation. Emergency features include an easy-access emergency stop button and emergency manual lowering device. Includes an accessory storage bag for slings and charger and an optional digital scale is also available. 1-year limited warranty.

entry.title: TheraBand Professional Non-Latex Resistance Bands Green-Heavy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ali Med
Type: Theraband
Price: 68.95

TheraBand Professional Non-Latex Resistance Bands are available in 8 color-coded levels of resistance. Proper use of these systems for resistive exercise provides both positive and negative force on the muscles, improving strength, range of motion and cooperation of muscle groups. Color-coded progressive resistance gives at-a-glance documentation of progress from one level to the next. And because it is not made with natural rubber latex TheraBand Non-Latex Resistance Bands are an ideal option for users with latex sensitivities.

Green-Heavy

entry.summary:
Vendor: Skil-Care
Type: Gait Belt
Price: 18.99

These cotton gait belts effectively reduce the possibility of patient falls staff back injury.

Features

  • Durable 2 Inch wide belt.
  • Available in standard and heavy-duty cotton webbing.
  • Reduces possibility of back injury during resident ambulation.
  • 60" belt safe for residents up to 250lbs
  • Derlin Buckle

entry.title: Skil-Care Pinstripe White Gait Belt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skil-Care
Type: Gait Belt
Price: 16.98

Skil-Care Pinstripe White Gait Belt is made of two inches wide strong cotton webbing. It makes lifting, ambulation, and transfer easier and reduces the caregivers exposure to back injury. It is not to be used as a safety restraint in the wheelchair, chairs of any kind, or in bed. This gait belt is durable, completely launderable and effectively reduce the possibility of patient falls staff back injury. The nylon belts wipe clean and are not fluid absorbent.

*This Item Ships Free*

  • Durable low maintenance triple chrome plated carbon steel frame is long lasting
  • Dual axle position allow variations of seat-to-floor heights

  • Urethane rear tires mounted on ''no flex'' wheels offer superior performance

  • Low maintenance dual sealed precision bearings
  • Flame retardant upholstery resists mildew and bacteria as well as cold crack and UV damage

entry.title: GF 3-Wheel Cruiser Rollator
entry.summary:
Vendor: GF Medical
Type: 3-Wheel Rollator
Price: 140.00

Three wheel Rollator alluminum frame  Maximum maneuverability 250 lbs weight capacity

As an aluminium frame, three wheel rollator, the Cruiser provides maximum maneuverability and comfort for those who do no require the extra stability of a four wheel rollator. Chrome-plated steel frame. Adjustable handle height. Easy folding. Locking loop brakes. Puncture resistant 8" wheels for indoor and outdoor use. 250lb maximum weight capacity. Designed to meet the requirements of HCPCS code: E0143. Includes laminated color operating instructions. Limited lifetime warranty.
